content:
The H23 Langsam Family


An unknown Langsam had two known children.

  • Leib was married to Esther Billet and they had one known son.
    • Abraham (1888/91 - 1961) lived in Przemysl and came to the USA where he naturalized. He was married in Manhattan on June 23, 1910 to Malka/Mollie Billet, daughter of Jacob Billet and Janty Intrader . They had two sons.
      Jack & Milton
  • Leah married Leibush Lustig and had five known children.
    • Ephraim
    • child
    • child
    • child
    • David married and had one known daughter.
      Renne Aronoff


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA
